text: a loko tamane ganimata (yud'dha pachi malelo mala) vise savala kare che, tame kahi do ke a ganimato allaha mate che ane payagambara mate che, to tame allahathi daro ane potana andaro'andarana sambandhone sudharo ane allaha ta'ala ane tena payagambaranum anusarana karo, jo tame imana dharavata hoya
